column1: Herugrim was the sword of King Théoden of Rohan
column2: hidden from him for many years by his traitorous councilor Gríma. After being cured by Gandalf
column4: and rode with it to the Battle of the Hornburg and the Battle of the Pelennor Fields.

column3: as translated through Old English. It has been noted that herugrim is in the Wikipedia:Mercian dialect of Old English (the spelling of the "standard" Wikipedia:West Saxon dialect (Old English) would have been heorugrim).
